restrictionTemplate.name: ForObject(ObjectField)
restrictionTemplate.condition:
// ForObject(ObjectField = "") // The template is used to restrict reference items, documents, and // other object lists by the Reference field. Also, it is used to restrict items of dependent lists // of objects and register records by the owner object field.
// Parameters: // ObjectField - name of the field that stores reference to the object the list item depends on. // Value "" (by default) is the same as the name of the Reference field.
#If &ListsWithReadRestrictionDisabled = "Undefined" #Then // Infobase is locked for update. WHERE FALSE
#ElseIf Not StrContains(&AccessRestrictionTemplatesVersions, ",ForRegister5,") #Then Error: Template update to version supplied in the EditAccessGroupsMembers role required. Reason: Version 5 of the ForRegister access restriction template is obsolete. Object: #CurrentTableName. Right: #CurrentAccessRightName.
#ElseIf &ListsWithReadRestrictionDisabled = "All" #Then // All access kinds are disabled for the user or // restriction at the record level is not used. WHERE TRUE
#ElseIf StrContains(&ListsWithReadRestrictionDisabled, #CurrentTableName) #Then // Restriction for the current table is disabled for the user. WHERE TRUE
#ElseIf StrContains(&AccessRestrictionTemplatesVersions, ",SessionRestartRequired,") #Then Error. Application version is updated, restart the session. Object: #CurrentTableName, Right: #CurrentAccessRightName.
#ElseIf #CurrentAccessRightName <> "Read" #Then // Checking rights Insert, Update, and Delete BeforeWrite / OnWrite. WHERE TRUE
#ElseIf Not StrContains(&ListsWithAccessGroupsAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;") AND Not StrContains(&ListsWithUsersAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;") #Then
Error: Access restriction update required. Reason: Cannot get the access restriction option for ForObject template from the session parameters. Object: #CurrentTableName. Right: #CurrentAccessRightName. #Else
CurrentTable WHERE TRUE IN ( SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM InformationRegister.AccessKeysForObjects AS AccessKeysForObjects #If StrContains(&ListsWithAccessGroupsAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;") #Then LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.AccessGroupSetsAccessKeys AS AccessGroupSetsAccessKeys ON #If &CurrentExternalUser = Value(Catalog.ExternalUsers.EmptyRef) #Then AccessGroupSetsAccessKeys.AccessKey = AccessKeysForObjects.UsersAccessKey #Else AccessGroupSetsAccessKeys.AccessKey = AccessKeysForObjects.ExternalUsersAccessKey #EndIf AND AccessGroupSetsAccessKeys.AccessGroupsSet = &AllowedAccessGroupsSet #EndIf #If StrContains(&ListsWithAccessGroupsAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;*") #Then
LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.AccessGroupSetsAccessKeys AS AccessKeysOfAllowedAccessGroupSet ON #If &CurrentExternalUser = Value(Catalog.ExternalUsers.EmptyRef) #Then AccessKeysOfAllowedAccessGroupSet.AccessKey = AccessKeysForObjects.UsersAccessKey #Else AccessKeysOfAllowedAccessGroupSet.AccessKey = AccessKeysForObjects.ExternalUsersAccessKey #EndIf AND AccessKeysOfAllowedAccessGroupSet.AccessGroupsSet = &AllowedBlankAccessGroupsSet #EndIf #If StrContains(&ListsWithUsersAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;") #Then
#If &CurrentExternalUser = Value(Catalog.ExternalUsers.EmptyRef) #Then LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.UsersAccessKeys AS UsersAccessKeys ON UsersAccessKeys.AccessKey = AccessKeysForObjects.UsersAccessKey AND UsersAccessKeys.User = &AllowedUser #Else LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.ExternalUsersAccessKeys AS UsersAccessKeys ON UsersAccessKeys.AccessKey = AccessKeysForObjects.ExternalUsersAccessKey AND UsersAccessKeys.ExternalUser = &AllowedUser #EndIf #EndIf #If StrContains(&ListsWithUsersAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;+") #Then
#If &CurrentExternalUser = Value(Catalog.ExternalUsers.EmptyRef) #Then LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.UsersAccessKeys AS AccessKeysOfUserGroupSets ON AccessKeysOfUserGroupSets.AccessKey = AccessKeysForObjects.UsersAccessKey AND AccessKeysOfUserGroupSets.User = &AllowedUserGroupsSet #Else LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.ExternalUsersAccessKeys AS AccessKeysOfUserGroupSets ON AccessKeysOfUserGroupSets.AccessKey = AccessKeysForObjects.ExternalUsersAccessKey AND AccessKeysOfUserGroupSets.ExternalUser = &AllowedUserGroupsSet #EndIf #EndIf WHERE #If "#ObjectField" = "" #Then AccessKeysForObjects.Object = CurrentTable.Ref #Else AccessKeysForObjects.Object = CurrentTable.#ObjectField #EndIf AND ( #If StrContains(&ListsWithAccessGroupsAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;") #Then Not AccessGroupSetsAccessKeys.AccessKey Is NULL #Else False #EndIf #If StrContains(&ListsWithAccessGroupsAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;*") #Then Or Not AccessKeysOfAllowedAccessGroupSet.AccessKey Is NULL #EndIf #If StrContains(&ListsWithUsersAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;") #Then Or Not UsersAccessKeys.AccessKey Is NULL #EndIf #If StrContains(&ListsWithUsersAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;+") #Then Or Not AccessKeysOfUserGroupSets.AccessKey Is NULL #EndIf ) ) #EndIf
#If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";ConsiderRightsSettingsOnBuildQueryExecutionPlan;") #Then #If Not StrContains(&ListsWithUsersAccessKeysRestriction, #CurrentTableName + ":#ObjectField;") #Then AND CASE WHEN #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";31;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";30;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";29;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";28;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";27;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";26;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";25;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";24;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";23;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";22;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";21;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";20;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";19;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";18;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";17;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";16;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";15;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";14;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";13;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";12;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";11;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";10;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";09;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";08;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";07;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";06;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";05;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";04;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";03;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";02;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";01;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";00;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END #Else AND CASE WHEN #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";31^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";30^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";29^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";28^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";27^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";26^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";25^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";24^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";23^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";22^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";21^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";20^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";19^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";18^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";17^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";16^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";15^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";14^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";13^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";12^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";11^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";10^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";09^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";08^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";07^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";06^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";05^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";04^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";03^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";02^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";01^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf AND #If StrContains(&CommonAccessRestrictionTemplateParameters, ";00^;") #Then True = True #Else True <> False #EndIf THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END #EndIf #EndIf
